main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a circular, saucer-shaped object with a hump over a city park in Denver, Colorado.
interesting points: The object had a bright, grayish-white light and was compared in size to a half-dollar held at arm's length.
The object appeared to drop out of sight with a slight curve, but then disappeared almost instantaneously.
The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds.
No optical aids were used by the observer.
The weather conditions were clear with high, thin broken clouds and good visibility.
sighted object: circular, saucer-shaped object with a hump
